topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358

topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54890ec86368720bac0b0000#post_54890ec86368720bac0b0000

They're mostly different factions (Imagine the ones from Fallout, like the Brotherhood of Steel and such), each have their own duties and such.

And so far, only two factions (three if you scracth the surface) have been openly showned: The Sovereigns (Adventure 02 and Tamers) and the Royal Knights (Frontier and Savers)
